updateOnSync.label: Update after Joplin sync
updateOnSync.description: Update the Noteoverview after a Joplin syncronisation. Independent of the update interval

showNoteCount.label: Show note count
showNoteCount.description: Show the number of notes matching the search

showNoteCountText.label: Note count text
showNoteCountText.description: Text for the display of the found notes, %s is replace with the number of matched notes

todoStatusOpen.label: Field status: %s
todoStatusOpen.description: Text for the status field, when the todo is not completed

todoStatusDone.label: Field status: %s
todoStatusDone.description: Text for the status field, when the todo is completed

todoStatusOverdue.label: Field status: %s
todoStatusOverdue.description: Text for the `status` field, when the due date of the todo is exceeded

colorTodoOpen.label: Color: %s
colorTodoOpen.description: HTML color for the %s, when the todo is not completed

colorTodoWarning.label: Color: %s
colorTodoWarning.description: HTML color for the %s when the due date is reached in x hours

todoWarningHours.label: %s hours
todoWarningHours.description: How many hours before %s the warning color should be applied. 0 = Disabled

colorTodoOpenOverdue.label: Color: %s
colorTodoOpenOverdue.description: HTML color for the %s, when the todo is over the due date

colorTodoDone.label: Color: %s
colorTodoDone.description: HTML color for the {{field_due_date}} and {{field_todo_completed}}, when the todo is completed. Seperate the color for {{field_due_date}} and {{field_todo_completed}} by a comma

colorTodoDoneOverdue.label: Color: %s
colorTodoDoneOverdue.description: HTML color for the {{field_due_date}} and {{field_todo_completed}}, when the todo was completed after the due date. Seperate the color for {{field_due_date}} and {{field_todo_completed}} by a comma

colorTodoDoneNodue.label: Color: %s
colorTodoDoneNodue.description: HTML color for the %s, when the todo was completed but no due date was set
